name: @withfig/autocomplete-tools
description: Command line tools for working with fig autocomplete specs
author: The Fig Team

scripts.build: rm -rf build/ && tsc && cp -r boilerplate build/boilerplate
scripts.generate-spec: npm run build && GENERATE_SPEC=true node build/index.js generateFigSpec && npm run merge-specs
scripts.merge-specs: node build/index.js merge generated/autocomplete-tools-spec.ts generated/autocomplete-tools-spec-new.ts --preset commander

prepack.description: Run build before packing the package for publishing
